description: The Aspen Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Aspen Mountain for the snow report
Alexa, ask Aspen Mountain for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Aspen Mountain
shortDescription: The Aspen Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Aspen Mountain.
